name: Threasures Thief
description:
This game was made for pc, it is an action, adventure and puzzle game, a singleplayer in third person.

Story

The game starts in a forest where the thief has to go through to reach the temple that hides the treasure, being the forest dense the character has to find his way and defeat enemies to reach the temple.  At the entrance of the temple, the character is faced with several enemies that he will have to face, in order to continue his search for the treasure. After entering the temple you have to solve several puzzles, such as a 3 circle puzzle, where the objective is to align them, another puzzle will be activated button doors to get to the top of the tower and find the treasure.

Gameplay

In order to play you only need your pc, the keyboard is used to move the player(WASD or the arrows) and some interactions(E) and to move the camara you will need to use the mouse. The mouse is also used to shoot.

  • Collect items.
  • Kill enemys.
  • Solve the puzzles.
